A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: gutted - one word to sum up my feelings after watching the last Jedi.\nAfter an exciting first 10 mins the film turns into a painfully slow chase film with a pointless mid break at a casino which serves no purpose than to give some characters screen time with no end result. We had characters who can fly in space\, milking of space elephants\, forced and pointless humour and the worst direction for one of cinemas most iconic characters. I wonder if the power of Disney has forced some reviewers hands as I cannot believe the positive reviews I've seen. Awful\, truly awful. Worst SW film by a country mile.
